---
category: news
title: "Deep-learning system to improve the quality and efficiency of volumetric heart segmentation for breast cancer"
excerpt: "Although artificial intelligence algorithms are often developed and applied for narrow tasks, their implementation in other medical settings could help to improve patient care. Here we assess whether a deep-learning system for volumetric heart segmentation on computed tomography (CT) scans developed in cardiovascular radiology can optimize treatment planning in radiation oncology."
